Name: Laddu
Description: Sweet round laddus offered as prasad.

Localizations.LocalizedDescription: Sweet round laddus offered as prasad.
मिठाई गोल लड्डू जो प्रसाद के रूप में दी जाती है।

Name: Modak
Description: Sweet dumplings offered especially during Ganesh Chaturthi.

Localizations.LocalizedDescription: Sweet dumplings offered especially during Ganesh Chaturthi.
विशेष रूप से गणेश चतुर्थी के दौरान दी जाने वाली मिठाई।

Name: Kheer
Description: Traditional rice pudding served as prasad.

Localizations.LocalizedDescription: Traditional rice pudding served as prasad.
पारंपरिक चावल की खीर जो प्रसाद के रूप में परोसी जाती है।
